title: Towel, 1740
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, running, interlacing, and surface satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Towel ornamented with three bands of embroidery; one showing the Virgin and Child under a canopy with "1740 DRAD" and two flowering scrolls.  At the bottom, a band of darning and knotted fringe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 1740.
1740. Medium: cotton embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, running, interlacing, and surface satin stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-258.
